fr.umlv.escape.ship

Class ShipFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.umlv.escape.ship.ShipFactory

  • public class ShipFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class supplies methods to create properly a Ship.

      • createShip

        public Ship createShip(java.lang.String shipName,
              int posX,
              int posY,
              int health,
              java.lang.String trajectory)
        Create a Ship.
        Parameters:
        shipName - the name of the ship to create.
        posX - the x position of the ship to create.
        posY - the y position of the ship to create.
        health - the health of the ship to create.
        trajectory - the name of the move behavior of the ship.
        Returns:
        the ship created.
